intro: Psychotria paucinervia, commonly known as the narrow-veined psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Peru. The plant is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves with prominent venation patterns. It produces small, white to pale yellow flowers that are typically clustered in inflorescences. Psychotria paucinervia is often found in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests and undergrowth.
